member.name: T:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.DescriptionAttribute
member.summary: Specifies a description for a property or event. CA1813: Avoid unsealed attributes

member.name: P:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.DescriptionAttribute.Description
member.summary: Gets the description stored in this attribute.

member.name: M:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.DescriptionAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DescriptionAttribute class with a description.

member.name: T:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.Converter.FlipToScaleXValueConverter
member.summary: ValueConverter which converts the PackIconFlipOrientation enumeration value to ScaleX value of a ScaleTransformation.

member.name: T:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.Converter.FlipToScaleYValueConverter
member.summary: ValueConverter which converts the PackIconFlipOrientation enumeration value to ScaleY value of a ScaleTransformation.

member.name: T:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.Converter.MarkupConverter
member.summary: MarkupConverter is a MarkupExtension which can be used for IValueConverter.

member.name: M:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.Converter.MarkupConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Converts a value.
member.param: The value produced by the binding source.
The type of the binding target property.
The culture language to use in the converter.
member.returns: A converted value. If the method returns null, the valid null value is used.

member.name: M:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.Converter.MarkupConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Converts a value.
member.param: The value that is produced by the binding target.
The culture language to use in the converter.
member.returns: A converted value. If the method returns null, the valid null value is used.

member.name: T:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconControlBase
member.summary: Class PackIconControlBase which is the base class for any PackIcon control.

member.name: P:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconControlBase.Data
member.summary: Gets the path data for the current icon kind.

member.name: F:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconControlBase.FlipProperty
member.summary: Identifies the Flip dependency property.

member.name: P:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconControlBase.Flip
member.summary: Gets or sets the flip orientation.

member.name: F:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconControlBase.RotationAngleProperty
member.summary: Identifies the RotationAngle dependency property.

member.name: P:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconControlBase.RotationAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation (angle).

member.name: F:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconControlBase.SpinProperty
member.summary: Identifies the Spin dependency property.

member.name: P:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconControlBase.Spin
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the inner icon is spinning.

member.name: F:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconControlBase.SpinDurationProperty
member.summary: Identifies the SpinDuration dependency property.

member.name: P:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconControlBase.SpinDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of the spinning animation (in seconds). This will also restart the spin animation.
member.value: The duration of the spin in seconds.

member.name: F:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconControlBase.SpinEasingFunctionProperty
member.summary: Identifies the SpinEasingFunction dependency property.

member.name: P:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconControlBase.SpinEasingFunction
member.summary: Gets or sets the EasingFunction of the spinning animation. This will also restart the spin animation.

member.name: F:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconControlBase.SpinAutoReverseProperty
member.summary: Identifies the SpinAutoReverse dependency property.

member.name: P:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconControlBase.SpinAutoReverse
member.summary: Gets or sets the AutoReverse of the spinning animation. This will also restart the spin animation.
member.value: true if [spin automatic reverse]; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconFlipOrientation
member.summary: Enum PackIconFlipOrientation for the Flip property of any PackIcon control.

member.name: F:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconFlipOrientation.Normal
member.summary: No flip

member.name: F:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconFlipOrientation.Horizontal
member.summary: Flip the icon horizontal

member.name: F:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconFlipOrientation.Vertical
member.summary: Flip the icon vertical

member.name: F:MahApps.Metro.IconPacks.PackIconFlipOrientation.Both
member.summary: Flip the icon vertical and horizontal
